comments.body: looking at the trace, seems like i missed a lock here in the original change

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +162,166 @@			cc.mu.RUnlock()
			continue
		}
		clusterClient, clientFound := cc.clusterKubeClientMap[cluster.Name]
		clusterStatusOld, statusFound := cc.clusterClusterStatusMap[cluster.Name]

comments.body: The next step now is to write a VersionedListWatch which will take v1.ListOptions as argument instead of the unversioned one. That way these controllers will not need to depend on `pkg/api` at all, which will be awesome!

Or perhaps define an interface for ListOptions, something like

``` go
ListOptionsInterface {
  func GetLabelSelector() labels.Selector
  func GetFieldSelector() fields.Selector
  func GetResourceVersion() string
}
```
